front.title: Guide brief 7

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.).

front.abstract: This Guide Brief offers a conceptual road map for applications of the Guide to all communities. While resilience is often associated with larger urban cities, resilience concepts can be applied to communities of any type or size. The primary intended audience for this Guide Brief is the local government convener and the collaborative planning team.
